skills.name: Lights on Stage
skills.description:
[SP: 15][CD: 30s] Switches on the Lighting FX for 10s. When the character equipping Glactic Nova is in the Lighting FX area, each attack hit deals 200.0 more Physical DMG.
[Concert Stage] When picking up a Sparkling Star, all characters gain 5% Crit Rate for 5s. Effect cannot stack.

skills.name: Sparkling Star
skills.description: When the character is deployed, 1 Sparkling Star appears nearby every 3s. Sparkling Star lasts 4.5s. When picking up the Sparkling Star, deal 200% ATK of Physical DMG to a random, nearby target and enemies surrounding it.
